objective: Multiple users across different departments can't access shared files on the network drive

problem_context.user_input: Multiple users across different departments can't access shared files on the network drive

knowledge_base.chunk_text:
# IT Policies and Procedures

This document contains the official IT policies and procedures for the organization.

---

## 2. HIGH-LEVEL NETWORK OVERVIEW

### Network Architecture Diagram

```
                    INTERNET
                       ║
                       ║ (Fiber - [Speed])
                       ║
                   [FIREWALL]
            (Primary + Secondary)
                       ║
                   [Router]
              (Core Network Gateway)
                       ║
            ┌──────────┼──────────┐
            │          │          │
       [Switch 1]  [Switch 2]  [Switch 3]
       (Core/      (Building    (Building
        Distro)     A)           B)
            │          │          │
        [Access    [Access    [Access
         Layer]     Layer]     Layer]
            │          │          │
       (Users)    (Users)    (Users)
```

### User VLAN to Server VLAN

#### Rule 500: Allow Users to File Server

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| **Rule Number** | 500 |
| **Name** | Allow-Users-to-FileServer |
| **Source Zone** | Internal |
| **Source Address** | 10.2.0.0/22 (User VLAN) |
| **Destination Zone** | Internal |
| **Destination Address** | 10.1.0.31 (File Server) |
| **Service** | SMB (TCP/445) |
| **Action** | ALLOW |
| **Logging** | DISABLED (too verbose) |
| **Purpose** | User file share access |
| **Business Owner** | [Department] |
| **Created Date** | [Date] |
| **Last Reviewed** | [Date] |

#### Rule 501: Allow Users to Application Server
